post.desc:
Okay, Nazrin. So you remember Sumireko? Yeah, yeah. That outsider girl. She has this small tablet about the size of a card that shines whenever she swipes on it, right? Yeah, it's called a "phone", and mine also looks like that, just a different color. It's grey, with a little thing attached on the back. Oh, and it should still have my earphones – a black strand that has two spherical ends – still attached to it too. And if you yell-

Huh? One of your rats saw it very recently? With **Koishi**? And she's right behind-
